title: Looking for a good champion to otp
body: Just like the title, im looking for good champions to one trick. I like playing fighters and champions that are good duelers.

replies.body: Find a champion you enjoy playing personally, if you're still unsure i suggest fiora, jax, irelia. They are VERY strong duelers.

theres no secret to OTPing

pick ur favourite champ, one trick it
have a backup for 1/10 games
